fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Pandemonium: The first time you empty your hand, activate a Minigun?! that targets a random 5 people. The attack will appear to be from nobody.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sabotage: Choose 2 cards in your hand. Discard them and Attack! 2 random non Chaos members. Nobody will have appeared to play the attack. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Trick: Discard your hand (excluding Satcheled cards). The next 3 attacking cards played will target a random non-Chaos player that is not the original target. [1 use, Unique]
- Commotion: All players will appear to be a random role for the rest of the phase. [1 use, Unique, Post-Mortem]
